itunes:title: Episode 506 - Special Guest Dr. Frank
title: Episode 506 - Special Guest Dr. Frank
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Dr. Gabe Frank from The Frank Institute and discuss a subject men don't often talk about; hormone replacement therapy.  Ross and Dan open up about their mental health struggles over the years an...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Dr. Gabe Frank from The Frank Institute and discuss a subject men don't often talk about; hormone replacement therapy.  Ross and Dan open up about their mental health struggles over the years and the importance of getting your hormone levels checked by a doctor, because chances are some of the mental issues that you can't control aren't your fault. If you're feeling suicidal, irritated, and can't figure out why-- this episode is for you.  Please know there are doctors who live in your area who can help, and hopefully us opening up helps you.

If you're feeling suicidal, irritated, and can't figure out why-- this episode is for you.  Please know there are doctors who live in your area who can help, and hopefully us opening up helps you.
